snippet.title: Cataclismo - Official Release Date Trailer
snippet.description:
Cataclismo, the upcoming LEGO-inspired strategy game with brick-by-brick building elements where you'll both design fortresses and train troops, will be released for PC on July 16. It features a 20+ hour campaign along with Survival and Skirmish modes. It's from Digital Sun Games, the developers of Moonlighter. 

Wishlist it on Steam if you're interested: https://store.steampowered.com/app/1422440/Cataclismo/

#IGN #Gaming #Cataclismo
